Dear Student_C,

Thank you for your continued interest in School_C and for submitting your application again with a clear commitment to enroll.

At this time, we are still reserving our remaining seat for higher-priority candidates on our list, so we are not able to extend an offer to you this round.

If it becomes clear that we cannot finalize a match with any higher-priority student, we will reassess immediately.

Sincerely,
